verbose_text: This binding of AMP to the gamma subunit appears to promote AMPK activity through at least two mechanisms : facilitated phosphorylation of the alpha subunit [XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR] and inhibition of dephosphorylation by protein phosphatases 2Calpha and 2Ac [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
evidence: phosphorylation of the alpha subunit [ XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR ] and inhibition of dephosphorylation by protein phosphatases
